note: Serena Willow is a spiritual guide and the creator of DivineMarkings.com. Raised in a nature-rich town, her early life was influenced by her grandmother's folktales and Bible stories. Serena pursued anthropology in higher education, exploring diverse cultures and spiritual beliefs around the world. She has had profound experiences with angel numbers and dream symbolism, which led her to study spiritual symbolism extensively.
